section.p: <HTML><HEAD> <META content="MSHTML 6.00.2900.3429" name=GENERATOR></HEAD> <BODY>This class contains the identity of &nbsp;the device used to transmit the vital sign(s).&nbsp; Note that this device may be associated with multiple measurement devices.</BODY></HTML>
This class contains the information for the Home TeleHealth Monitor Equipment used by the patient.
